tool_description: An API that i made to learn how Rapid_API works
name: Rapid_learn_api
title: Rapid_learn_api

api_list.name: /api/user/{name}
api_list.description: Return the Greeting for the username that was passed as a parameter

api_list.name: /api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid_learn_api.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid_learn_api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid_learn_api.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid_learn_api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
